While inside his puppet [[Hiruko]], Sasori sends the puppet's iron tail towards the opponent, hitting them repeatedly and causing them to fall to the ground. Finally he stabs them in the torso with a powerful thrust of the tail.

== Trivia ==
* The name [[Wikipedia:Vaiśravaṇa#In Japan|Bishamon]] is written with the kanji for {{translation|'help'|毘}} and {{translation|'[[Wikipedia:Shramana|shramana]]'|沙門}}, which in turn is written with the kanji for {{translation|'sand'|沙}} and {{translation|'gate'|門}}.
